name: KING OF THE DUNGEON
description:
Use ZQSD or ↑↓←→ to move

Right click is fire and left click is your special ability.

There is 10 classes and each of have different attack, speed and health.

Defeat 3 bosses to become the King Of The Dungeon !

How to play online with your friends ( 4 players ) :

-Choose play online

-Everyone choose a different player (P1,P2,P3,P4)

-P1 choose gamemode ect... choose your classes,

-Become the king !
